description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 21/02121/HOU (Erection of two-storey rear extension and first floor rear extensions. Installation of new pitched glazed roof to existing rear conservatory and formation of rear first floor terrace. Installation of 5no rear rooflights, 5no front rooflights, front solar panels and raising chimney stack to facilitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration) to provide reduction of two storey element of rear extension, associated changes to loft layout, fenestration and wall treatments

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AAS Kingston Hill - Designated in UDP 1998

decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 21/02121/HOU is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:429-Pl001-Existing Ground Floor Plan429-Pl002-Existing First Floor Plan429-Pl003-Existing Loft Plan429-Pl004-Existing Roof Plan429-Pl005-Existing Elevations North and South429-Pl006-Existing Elevations East and West429-Pl007-A-Proposed Ground Floor Plan429-Pl008-A-Proposed First Floor Plan429-Pl009-A-Proposed Loft Plan429-Pl010-A-Proposed Roof Plan429-Pl011-A-Proposed Elevations North and South429-Pl012-A-Proposed Elevations East and West429-Pl013-A-Existing Proposed Section A429-Pl100-Existing Location PlanReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
